attributes.action: Swakeleys Pole Hill Road to be made wider
attributes.additional_details: Swakeleys School, Abbotsfield High school and Highfield Primary school's Pole Hill road in the morning and afternoons is heavily packed sometimes causing delays for children to get to school for all three schools. The width of the road is very small; making the road wider by removing the extra dead trees on the side of the road and putting up a 5mph sign should be able to reduce problems for parents and the schools.
